title: What is the highest achieved pressure within a vessel ever recorded? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question: - “ A pressure of 770 giga pascals was recorded to be measured. See Ref: “Record high pressure squeezes secrets out of osmium: X-ray experiments reveal peculiar behaviour of the most incompressible metal on Earth” Note that his is the pressure in a specially deigned press, not strictly contained by a pressure vessel. For a pressure vessel to restrain such a pressure, the material stress itself would have to resist the pressure and materials that strong are not known.
